description.english: You can now flip 21 coins. And sadly, this is the max amount of coins you can flip
You basically beat the game. Good job!

displayName.english: You are now a little bit luckier
You are pretty lucky rn (right now)

description.english: 75% Chance for your coin flips to be succesful

displayName.english: Things can't always be 100% in life

description.english: 93.75% Chance for your coin flips to be successful. Math is not my strong side, but if 93.75% + 5% = 98.75%. That means you will always have a 1.25% chance to not hit your coin flips on your side of choosing. Well considering it's only 1.25% that is pretty much 0% right? Unless your just a really unlucky person and you for some reason will land on those 1.25% chances many times.
Well.. I guess you don't need to flip anything yourself anymore.
Damn, thats a lot of coin flips
I wonder how many times you hit tails
Hopefully you chose tails this time
you did in fact, click the pile of coins 10 times. good job!

displayName.english: You lost all your coins gambling 5 times

description.english: The next one will double your coins. I can feel it.

displayName.english: You doubled all your coins gambling 5 times
